title: Group of men, women, and children, including man wearing dark double breasted suit with light colored handkerchief in pocket, light colored collared shirt, and patterned necktie kneeling down handing box to little girl and gift in other hand, standing around cart holding small boxes reading "Christmas greetings,"  in doorway, sign above double doors reads "parlor B," certificate on wall reads "the frontiers of America membership certificate," and dark curtain with swag in background, in interior, possibly Gaines funeral home
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
